name: Starchild
description:
Set your outlook and change the way you approach the problems and opportunities on your journey.

Press one of the three buttons to change how you approach a certain obstacle in your path. You develop based on the decisions made during your journey.

Created for Global Game Jam 2014.

  • Martin Buntz - Audio
  • Martin Nerurkar - Code (Website)
  • Wendy Fox - Art (Website)
